releases.title: Jaws of Janus
releases.info: Jaws of Janus was recorded during four days in October 2022, one day in November 2022 and one day in April 2023. Engineered, mixed and mastered by Anders Backelin (AKA Bloodlord) at Armageddon Recordings, Vänersborg, Sweden. Music and lyrics by Revenge Prevails. Cover art and graphic design by Isabella Ramare.

lineup.name: Isabella Ramare as Herself
lineup.contribution: Evoker of Rumbling Tremors & Angelic Chanter

releases.title: Habitats
releases.info: Recorded during eight days between November 2019 and February 2020. Engineered, mixed and mastered by Anders Backelin at Armageddon Recordings, Vänersborg, Sweden. Lyrics by Josef the Sultan Svensson. Music by Revenge Prevails. Cover art and graphic design by Isabella Ramare. Released June 14th, 2020.

lineup.name: Josef Svensson as the Sultan
lineup.contribution: Lead vocals, guitars, keys and FX

releases.title: False Hope Cruelty
tracks: 6. The Creation of Destruction Part II (Minions of the Gloom)
releases.info: Album produced and recorded by Revenge Prevails Augusti 2016 to January 2017. Mixed by Ludvig 'Hlodyr' Björk. Mastered by Anders Lagerfors at Nacksving Studio 1. Music by Revenge Prevails. Lyrics by Josef 'the Sultan' Svensson except 'Habeas Corpus' by Ludvig 'Hlodyr' Björk. Artwork by Isabella Ramare. Released August 4th 2017.

lineup.name: Josef 'The Sultan' Svensson
lineup.contribution: Lead vocals, guitar, keyboard, accordion & trumpet

releases.title: Dark Trembling Solace
tracks: 5. The Creation of Destruction Part I (Redeemer of Dust and Clay)
releases.info: Album produced and recorded by Revenge Prevails, summer 2014. Mixed and mastered by Ludvig 'Hlodyr' Björk. Artwork by Isabella Ramare. Music by Revenge Prevails. Lyrics by Josef 'The Sultan' Svensson. Released May 22nd, 2015.

lineup.name: Josef 'The Sultan' Svensson
lineup.contribution: Lead Apocalypse Chanter, Six stringed Totem of Unholy Light and Keys of Tormenting Mirage

lineup.name: Christoffer 'Bilge-Blasting Impender' Helleren
lineup.contribution: Trembling Sticks of Fire and Apocalyptic Choir

lineup.name: Ludvig 'Hlodyr' Björk
lineup.contribution: Six Stringed Earthquake Summoning Device and Apocalyptic Choir

releases.title: Black Void Injection
releases.info: Produced by Revenge Prevails and Billy Mellström. Engineered mixed and mastered by Billy Mellström. Recorded at Billy's studio in Ljungskile, Sweden, Autumn 2012. Music by Revenge Prevails. Lyrics by Josef. Artwork and layout by Isabella. Released March 13th, 2013.

lineup.name: Josef
lineup.contribution: Axe of Death and Bleeding Throat
